messages.message:
Hey team, raising a random question about new users:
when a new user hit this when login:
```Your account has not yet been approved
A site administrator can approve your account or provide a verification token.```
How can we approve this account *without using a token*?  I tried play around in a sandbox and just can't find any approval button...

you still have to use a token, there’s a different URL they go to to apply the token upon login. In the main confluence page, can you look for a link called “how to create an account on instabase”, it’s near the bottom. that should give you the links

yeah got it, so there is no straight approval then. We just still have to go through token.
Thank you Heymian!
